benchmark.js

  • opal/stdlib/nodejs/node_modules/glob/node_modules/minimatch/benchmark.js
  • Last modified: 2015-08-19 03:18:33 +0200

var m = require('./minimatch.js') var pattern = “*/.js” var expand = require('brace-expansion') var files = expand('x/y/z/{1..1000}.js') var start = process.hrtime()

for (var i = 0; i < 1000; i++) {

for (var f = 0; f < files.length; f++) {
  var res = m(pattern, files[f])
}
if (!(i%10)) process.stdout.write('.')

} console.log('done') var dur = process.hrtime(start) console.log('%s ms', dur*1e3 + dur/1e6)
